DOC.brief_summary: Determine bioequivalence of two forumulations with hyoscine butylbromide 10mg sugar coated tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Determine the Bioequivalence of Two Formulations of Hyoscine Butylbromide.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: healthy males and females, aged 1850years, BMI 18,530 Exclusion criteria: History of hypersensitivity or allergy to IMP
